meanings.definition: Someone who is very selective or fussy about choices or preferences.
meanings.sent1: My sister is a pickier when it comes to choosing her clothes.
meanings.sent2: The pickier in our group always takes the longest to decide on a restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The pickier at the party spent hours trying to find the perfect song to dance to.
meanings.sent4: Being a pickier can sometimes make it hard to enjoy spontaneous adventures.
meanings.sent5: The pickier's attention to detail is unmatched by anyone else in the team.

meanings.definition: Comparatively selective or fussy in making choices or decisions.
meanings.sent1: She became pickier about the quality of the ingredients she used in her cooking.
meanings.sent2: As he grew older, he became pickier about the books he read.
meanings.sent3: The pickier eater in the family always ends up with the plainest plate.
meanings.sent4: Her taste in art became pickier as she learned more about different styles.
meanings.sent5: The pickier customer demanded only the freshest produce from the market.
